name: IdeastreamPublicMedia
0:
”Alexa, open ideastream public media”
”Alexa, ask ideastream public media to listen live”
”Alexa, ask ideastream public media to browse programs.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ideastream public media
des:
Access Ideastream Public Media's live streams and podcasts using our Alexa skill, including content from WKSU, WCLV, JazzNEO, and our HD channels.

Once you've enabled the skill, say "Alexa, open Ideastream Public Media" and follow the prompts.

To play one of our live streams, just say "Alexa, ask Ideastream Public Media..."

"...to play WKSU."
"...to play WCLV."
"...to play JazzNEO."
"...to play All Classical."
"...to play News and More."
"...to play Folk Alley."

You can also listen to Ideastream Public Media local shows and podcasts. Just say "Alexa, ask Ideastream Public Media to browse programs" and choose a title from the list.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
